DHS Admits 600,000 Foreign H-1B Workers in American Jobs U.S. employers keep roughly 600,000 foreign H-1B visa workers in jobs throughout the United States, according to an unprecedented report released today by the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) agency.
